gml:Definition.gml:description: A property inside the service’s Capabilities document was added, removed or changed its value. If multiple changes happen at the same time (or in a time interval sufficiently small for a service to recognize them as belonging together) then they constitute one capabilities changed event.
gml:Definition.gml:name: CAPABILITIES_CHANGED

gml:Definition.gml:description: A new offering - as defined by the SWE Service Model - was added to the service.
gml:Definition.gml:name: OFFERING_ADDED

gml:Definition.gml:description: An offering- as defined by the SWE Service Model - was deleted from the service.
gml:Definition.gml:name: OFFERING_DELETED

gml:Definition.gml:description: A sensor was inserted at the service, resulting in a new offering - as defined by the SWE Service Model - having been added to the service.
gml:Definition.gml:name: SENSOR_INSERTED

gml:Definition.gml:description: The description of a sensor was updated, meaning that information contained in the current and / or previous versions of the sensor's description was added, removed or modified.
gml:Definition.gml:name: SENSOR_DESCRIPTION_UPDATED
